quest.name: Edelweiss, Edelweiss
journal: J'nasshym of the Brugaire Consortium seeks the services of a conveniently unoccupied adventurer.

J'nasshym of the Brugaire Consortium has tasked you with making a delivery─a gift parcel for services rendered─to the Dutiful Sisters of the Edelweiss. Head to the Sisters' “convent” found near Fisherman's Bottom, and hand the package directly to Lonwoerd.
You have delivered the package to Lonwoerd. Return to the Octant and speak with J'nasshym.

You return to J'nasshym and convey Lonwoerd's message. It would seem that the Dutiful Sisters are far more important to the continued well-being of Limsa Lominsa than their modest facade would indicate...
objectives: Deliver the package for the Dutiful Sisters to Lonwoerd.

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: Excuse me, misssir, but might you have a moment or two to spare? You seem the type who enjoys being accosted for menial tasks, and I require someone to make a delivery to the Dutiful Sisters of the Edelweiss.

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: I wouldn't be surprised if you hadn't heard of them─the Sisters prefer not to advertise their presence here in Limsa Lominsa.

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: They do, however, provide a rather unique service of which the Brugaire Consortium has recently been the beneficiary. I would have you deliver this package to their doorman, Lonwoerd, along with our profuse gratitude.

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: You'll find the Dutiful Sisters'...er, “convent” down near Fisherman's Bottom. Pray deliver the package to the doorman, along with the sincere gratitude of the Brugaire Consortium.

dialogue.name: LONWOERD
dialogue.text: Aye, this's the Dutiful Sisters o' the Edelweiss─a house o' deep reflection an' meditation. So unless ye've proper business with us, ye can kindly bugger off.

dialogue.name: LONWOERD
dialogue.text: Ho there, Forename. Ye lookin' to head inside?

dialogue.name: LONWOERD
dialogue.text: ...What's this, then? A parcel from the Brugaire Consortium, eh? Let's have a peek inside...

dialogue.name: LONWOERD
dialogue.text: Oooh, walnut bread an' ginger cookies. ...An' a few o' them Bismarck finger sandwiches, too! Them Consortium culls know the right way to show appreciation!

dialogue.name: LONWOERD
dialogue.text: Some o' them Sisters have unholy appetites, so I'd best save a few bites for meself afore I take this inside... Ahem. You let J'nasshym know we're always here should her boss have need of us again.

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: You've delivered the package as I requested? Very good. I shall pass on the Sisters' sentiments to my superior.

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: ...Hm? What manner of services do the Dutiful Sisters provide?

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: Continue your stay in Limsa Lominsa, and you'll likely find out soon enough. In fact, if you're confident in your abilities─and comfortable with the unconventional─you might wish to approach them yourself...

dialogue.name: JNASSHYM
dialogue.text: I'm quite sure an adventurer of your stature has already glimpsed the truth behind the facade. For a business such as ours, their presence in the city is incredibly reassuring!
